attr.title: Jet Lancer
attr.desc: Jet Lancer is a high-velocity aerial combat shooter where you duel enemy aviators, hunt giant robots, and defy death at supersonic speeds as you evolve from an unknown rookie aviator into a once-in-a-generation ACE pilot.
attr.desc_md:
Jet Lancer is a high-velocity aerial combat shooter where you duel enemy aviators, hunt giant robots, and defy death at supersonic speeds as you evolve from an unknown rookie aviator into a once-in-a-generation ACE pilot.

**Note: This is version 1.0.17!**
attr.inst:
Purchase the game from steam or gog.
Head to https://portmaster.games/ on the specific game files to place in ports/jetlancer/gamedata
attr.inst_md:
Purchase the game from https://store.steampowered.com/app/913060/Jet_Lancer/ OR https://www.gog.com/en/game/jet_lancer

Steam: Download the game, copy over all the game file to ports/jetlancer/gamedata
GOG: Download Version 1.0.17. Do this by going to More > Manage Installation > Configure > Uncheck auto-updates > Show more versions > Select Version 1.0.17. Copy over all the game file to ports/jetlancer/gamedata
